summary: The centuries old vampire Count Dracula comes to England to seduce his barrister Jonathan Harker's fiancée Mina Murray and inflict havoc in the foreign land.
cast: Gary Oldman|Winona Ryder|Anthony Hopkins|Keanu Reeves|Richard E. Grant|Cary Elwes|Billy Campbell|Sadie Frost|Tom Waits|Monica Bellucci|Michaela Bercu|Florina Kendrick|Jay Robinson|I.M. Hobson|Laurie Franks|Maud Winchester|Octavian Cadia|Robert Getz|Dagmar Stansova|Eniko Öss|Nancy Linehan Charles|Tatiana von Fürstenberg|Jules Sylvester|Hubert Wells|Daniel Newman|Honey Lauren|Judi Diamond|Robert Buckingham|Cully Fredricksen|Ele Bardha|Alain Blazevic|Mark Borkowski|Mary Cornell|Tina Cote|Christina Fulton|Jeffery Thomas Johnson|John F. Kearney|Paul Klar|Michael Laren|Moreen Littrell|Joe Murkijanian|Paul Muterspaugh|Adamo Palladino|Philip Pucci|John Michael Quinn|Heidi Schooler|Damon Stout
title: Drácula de Bram Stoker
